reason.translate: причина, основание, разум, повод, рассудок, рассуждать, размышлять, аргументировать
examples: He lost the ability to reason.
There is no reason to panic.
The children must learn to reason.
There is no reason to disbelieve him.
There is a show of reason in it.
She has reason to feel guilty.
I'll do anything for you within reason.
I tried to reason with her.
I gave a reason for my absence.
Can't you reason the boy out of such stupid behaviour?
He quit for personal reasons.
The man is endowed with reason.
I just can't get her to see reason!
The reason why she did it is a mystery.
She reasoned that something must be wrong.
They had good reason to rejoice.
There is no real reason to worry.
She had every reason to distrust him.
For no particular reason, he quit the job.
Dan burned to know what the reason could be.
My chief reason for quoting these delicate lines.

the predominate reason for the change
The person can give a reason to his preference.
Natalie was alarmed by the news, and with reason.

I see no reason why it shouldn't work.
I have otherwise no reason to suspect them.
